home.shareMusicDesc: Broadcast your creations and connect with fans

home.publishArticlesDesc: Share your ideas and stories with the community
home.interactDesc: Comment, like and follow your favorite artists
home.submitMusicTitle: Submit your music to the radio
home.submitMusicDesc: Are you an artist? Share your talent with our community. Send your creations and let thousands of listeners discover your music!

meta.homeTitle: Listen to the best independent online radio
meta.homeDesc: KracRadio: thematic channels (EBM, Electro, Metal, Jazz, Francophonie, Rock). AzuraCast streaming, non-stop.
meta.contactDesc: Contact info, music submission, sponsorship, donations and branding logos.

auth.resetPasswordDesc: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link.
auth.resetPasswordSentDesc: Check your inbox and click the link to reset your password.
auth.updatePasswordDesc: Choose a new password for your account.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.emailFromSupabase: üìß The confirmation email will come from Supabase (temporary)
auth.checkSpamFolder: üí° Don't forget to check your spam folder

welcomeTutorial.title: üëã Welcome to KracRadio!
welcomeTutorial.subtitle: Discover how to use your creator space

step0.title: ‚ù§Ô∏è Like your favorite songs
step0.description: Click the heart to add a song to your favorites while listening.
step0.action: Use the ‚ù§Ô∏è button in the audio player to like a song. Find your favorites in 'Liked Songs'.

step1.title: üìù Write blog articles
step1.description: Share your ideas, stories, and music news with the community.
step1.action: Click the 'Dashboard' button and create your first article.

step2.title: üéôÔ∏è Add podcasts
step2.description: Broadcast your audio shows and grow your audience.
step2.action: Access the dashboard and add your first podcast or import an RSS feed.

step3.title: üåê Publish your artist profile
step3.description: Create your online presence and connect with other artists.
step3.action: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Go to 'My Public Profile' and enable 'Public profile' to be visible!

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this article?

editor.title: Article Editor
editor.articleTitleHelp: This title appears at the top of the article and in search results
editor.contentHelp: WYSIWYG block editor with support for images, links, YouTube, tables, and more.
editor.excerptPh: Short summary for lists and archives (recommended 120-155 characters)...
editor.featuredImageDesc: The main image of your article
editor.imageUrlHelp: Upload your image to Supabase Storage and paste the URL here
editor.metaTitleHelp: {count}/60 characters ‚Ä¢ Leave empty to use article title
editor.metaDescriptionHelp: {count}/160 characters ‚Ä¢ Leave empty to use excerpt
editor.customSlugHelp: Leave empty to auto-generate from title
editor.allowCommentsDesc: Readers will be able to comment on this article
editor.isStickyDesc: This article will stay at the top of the list

sendMusic.title: How to send my music?
sendMusic.desc2: You will receive an email with instructions.

sponsor.title: How to sponsor the Radio?
sponsor.desc2: We offer an affordable package to add your banner and a link to your website on the radio for one year. All funds go to investing in and promoting artists.

donation.title: Is it possible to donate?
donation.desc2: This helps cover admin costs and invest in cool projects for artists.

brand.title: Download the logos
brand.desc: You can download our logo & brand package.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.noData: Schedule not available via API. Use the public page link above.
schedule.otherAreRotation: Other specialized channels are on 24/7 music rotation.

tutorial.title: üåê Your Community Guide
tutorial.subtitle: Discover how to manage your artist profile

step1.title: üîì Public Profile ON/OFF
step1.description: Control your profile visibility. Enable 'Public profile' to be visible in the artist directory and share your profile with the world.
step1.action: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Your profile must be PUBLIC to be visible to others! Go to the 'Settings' tab to enable this option.

step2.title: üîó Custom Public URL
step2.description: Create your unique artist name to have a custom URL (e.g., kracradio.com/profile/your-name).
step2.action: In 'Settings', set your 'Artist name' to create your unique public URL. Minimum 3 characters.

step3.title: üé® Profile Customization
step3.description: Add a banner and profile picture to customize your artist page.
step3.action: Go to the 'Customization' tab to upload your banner (1500x500px) and avatar (400x400px).

step4.title: üéµ Spotify Music Link
step4.description: Add your Spotify link to share your music. The Spotify player will display directly on your public profile.
step4.action: In the 'Music links' tab, add your Spotify link. For now, only Spotify is available (other platforms coming soon).

settings.title: Community settings
settings.customUrlActive: Using custom URL for your profile
settings.customUrlInactive: Using username as your profile URL
settings.customUrlDesc1: By default, your public profile URL uses your username.
settings.customUrlDesc2: A custom URL allows you to choose a different URL for your profile, useful for artists who want a stage name or brand.
settings.customUrlWarning: Note: Custom URLs must be unique and at least 3 characters.
settings.customUrlTaken: This custom URL is already taken
settings.usernameRequired: Enter a username (min. 3 characters) to be public
settings.artistSlugHelp: Spaces will be replaced with underscores (_). Minimum 3 characters.
settings.artistSlugRequired: You must set a username (min. 3 characters) to make your profile public
settings.artistSlugTakenError: The chosen name is already taken. Please choose another one.
settings.bioPlaceholder: Tell us about you, your music, your projects...
settings.isPublicDesc: Your profile will be visible to everyone
settings.isPrivateDesc: Only your connections will see your profile
settings.publicModeDesc: People can see your profile, public posts, blogs and podcasts. You can receive follow requests.
settings.visibilityBannerPublic: Your profile is visible to all visitors. Your articles, podcasts and information are publicly accessible.
settings.visibilityBannerPrivate: Your profile is in private mode. Enable to be discovered by the community.
settings.wantAnonymous: Prefer to stay anonymous? Simply disable public mode above.
settings.publicProfileDesc1: Your public profile is visible to all KracRadio visitors.
settings.publicProfileDesc3: You can disable your public profile at any time to make it private.

musicLinks.title: Music links
musicLinks.subtitle: Share your music on your profile
musicLinks.noGenresSelected: No genres selected. Add genres to help others discover your music.
musicLinks.allGenresSelected: All genres from this category selected
musicLinks.spotifyUrlHint: Paste your artist profile, album or Spotify playlist URL
musicLinks.deleteExisting: Delete existing link to add a new one
musicLinks.noLinksDesc: Add your Spotify link to share on your profile
musicLinks.onlyOne: You can only add one Spotify link. Delete the existing one to add a new one.
musicLinks.tip1: Spotify link appears on your public profile
musicLinks.tip2: Only one Spotify link allowed per profile
musicLinks.tip3: Spotify player displays directly on your profile

createPost.postRequired: Post must contain text or media

widget.title: KracRadio Widget
widget.subtitle: Add our radio player to your website with a single line of code
widget.pasteHint: Paste this code in the HTML of your site, where you want to display the widget.
widget.previewHint: Functional preview - click play to test!
widget.benefit1: Single line of code - Easy to integrate
widget.benefit3: Shows current song with album art
widget.helpText: If you have questions about widget integration, contact us.
widget.compatibilityText: Works on all modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
widget.performanceText: Lightweight script (~8KB), async loading, no impact on your SEO
widget.securityText: No data collected, no cookies, respects privacy
